snippet: Representative John F. Tierney, a Massachusetts Democrat fighting for re-election, is facing questions about money his wife received from a brother of hers involved in illegal gambling.
abstract: Rep John F Tierney of Massachusetts, Democrat seeking his ninth term in the House, is facing new questions over the illegal offshore gambling business once run by two of his brothers-in-law; scrutiny comes just months before election pits Tierney against Richard Tisei, the most viable opponent of his career.
lead_paragraph: Representative John F. Tierney, a Massachusetts Democrat fighting for re-election, is facing questions about money his wife received from a brother of hers involved in illegal gambling.

headline.seo: Watchdogs Question John F. Tierney’s Family Finances
headline.main: In House Race, Watchdogs Question Family Finances
headline.print_headline: In House Race, Watchdogs Question Family Finances
